name: Model9Patch3D
description: 3D plaforms and walls that resize as 9-patch. Corners don't stretch and sides can be tiled.

eventsBasedObjects.description: A 3D model with corners that don't stretch and sides that can be tiled.
eventsBasedObjects.name: Model9Patch3D

eventsFunctions.description: Create a 9-patch over a 3D box using 3D models for the parts.
eventsFunctions.name: Create9Patch

eventsFunctions.description: Create a 9-patch sliceover a 3D box using 3D models for the parts.
eventsFunctions.name: Create9PatchSlice
eventsFunctions.sentence: Create a 9-patch slice with corner: _PARAM1_ side: _PARAM2_ at Z: _PARAM3_ into _PARAM0_

events.comment: The hight is changed because it becomes the width when it's rotated by 90°.

eventsFunctions.name: TileOnX
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tile _PARAM1_ on X axis at Y: _PARAM2_ and Z: _PARAM3_ into _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.name: TileOnY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tile _PARAM1_ on Y axis at X: _PARAM2_ and Z: _PARAM3_ into _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Create tiles on X and Y axis.
eventsFunctions.name: TileOnXY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tile _PARAM1_ on X and Y axis at Z: _PARAM2_ into _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Create Z plan tiled according to properties
eventsFunctions.name: CreateZPlan
eventsFunctions.sentence: Create a Z plan of _PARAM1_ at Z: _PARAM2_ into _PARAM0_

events.comment: The scale is used instead of the dimension because the model may not be the exact same size as a cube.

propertyDescriptors.description: Only used by the scene editor.

propertyDescriptors.name: ShowBottomCenter
